title: Review: Yamaha MusicCast Sound Bar With Wireless Subwoofer YAS-706
description:
Shop for the Yamaha Black MusicCast Sound Bar With Wireless Subwoofer - YAS-706 at Abt: http://www.abt.com/product/105219/Yamaha-Black-MusicCast-Sound-Bar-With-Wireless-Subwoofer-YAS706.html?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=YAS706BL_20170112&utm_medium=video 

Features:
- MusicCast 
- Dynamic and Enveloping Sound 
- Triple Amplifier Drive 
- AIR SURROUND XTREME Provides Superior Virtual Surround 
- Five Sound Programs 
- Wireless Subwoofer for Flexible Placement 
- Control at Your Fingertips 
- Stream via Bluetooth or AirPlay® 
- Bluetooth Output for Convenient Music Streaming 
- Compressed Music Enhancer 
- HD Audio Decoding 
- HDMI® Terminals with 4K Ultra HD Support
